metadata.creator: Sergio Contreras
metadata.title: Programa Nosotros. Fusion Urbana
metadata.description: Also interview with Lidia Casas from the new El Popular newspaper, which used to be produced and distributed underground. Chilean mothers explain the disappearance of their sons during the Chilean dictatorship. Local announcements of fundraising events for Peruvian cholera epidemic. Fusion Urbana performs during the 5th LASER Festival.
metadata.subject: Media; Chile; LASER Festival; Fusion Urbana
